Summary: Better than Arizona Iced Tea Stix (gasp!)
text: I am hooked on Arizona Peach Iced Tea Stix. I have it on auto-deliver because if I run out a serious panic attack ensues. The Lipton tea was on a special so I decided to give it a try. SOOOO GOOOD! Even better than Arizona's. I like the hint of apricots. I really brings the favors all together. I would highly recommend.
